title: พงไพรเสียงกระซิบและผลึกแห่งเสียงสะท้อน
author: Elara Vance
description: A detective with a troubled past uncovers a conspiracy that goes deeper than she could ever imagine. In a city of eternal twilight, every shadow holds a secret.

title: Echoes of a Lost Star
author: Jax Orion
description: The last star-mapper in a dying galaxy embarks on a final journey to find the mythical Echo Star, a celestial body rumored to reboot the universe.

title: The Clockwork Alchemist
author: Helena Cogsmith
description: In a world powered by steam and alchemy, a brilliant inventor is framed for a crime she didn't commit, forcing her to go on the run with her automaton companion.

title: Gardens of the Sunken Moon
author: Sila Maris
description: A young botanist discovers a hidden, bioluminescent world in the deep ocean, but its existence is threatened by a corporation seeking to exploit its resources.
